long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you hate when you buy an eBook on Amazon, only to realize that you had a free copy with your O'Reilly subscription? This extension will check if an eBook exists with O'Reilly and place a button for you on the product page that will take you directly to the book.

Install and save money today!
